price: هغو كسانو چې لويي غوره كړې وه، وويل: موږ خو له هغه څه منكر يو چې تاسو منلي دي.
arabic: قَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱسۡتَكۡبَرُوٓاْ إِنَّا بِٱلَّذِيٓ ءَامَنتُم بِهِۦ كَٰفِرُونَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: qāla alladhīna is'takbarū innā bi-alladhī āmantum bihi kāfirūna
